short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple game to challenge your digital distractions! How long can you go without jumping around tabs & windows?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We love multitasking! But, sometimes we need to focus on that 1 page we're on; that 1 video we're watching. 

With NoFoMo, you can challenge your brain to reprogram your digital distraction habit. 

1. Set a timer. 
2. Start a challenge
3. Just stay on the tab you're on! You can continue browsing on that one tab. 

The goal is simple - just don't switch to / open up another tab or another window.

High Stakes Mode: For serious competitors, turn on "High Stakes Mode"! If you lose, we'll randomly close on of your open tabs.
 
PS: Don't worry, we don't block a tab or a window. We just tally when you get distracted and jump around!
